flawed_nl_solution:
Shelly made 6 /2 = <<6/2=3>>3 friends from after-school clubs.
She made 6 + 3 = <<6+3=9>>9 new friends at school this year.
Shelly will need 9 * 12 = <<9*12=180>>180 inches of thread to make each friend a keychain.
#### 180

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 108, not 180. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
